# spring security OAuth2.0. & Keycloak with spring boot

## Installing Keycloak 
Keycloak is an open-source Identity and Access Management solution targeted towards modern applications and services.

client_id:login-app
username:user1
password:
grant_type:password

Delete the reequired user actions 

Response
